page.title: 10Barkestone traffic census
page.content: local countIn 30 minutes all these things went by our school. 12 cars 5 vans 1 lorry 1 tractor 2 tornadoes which are fighter planes.Lorries have a cab and a trailer and it can carry a heavy load and has 8 wheels 2 seats and a steering wheel,a clutch a brake and accelerator.It alse has a fuel gauge a gearstick a speedometer a heater and a radio.There is a 30 miles per hour speed limit in a village and a town and 70 miles per hour on a motorway . Vehicles have to keep to the left of the road. Trains have coaches and one or two engines.You have to buy a ticket and the conductor checks your ticket.Buses go through Barkestone Plungar and Redmile every 2 hours.They go to Nottingham or Melton Mowbray.
